      • getEventMeshesCall

        public com.squareup.okhttp.Call getEventMeshesCall(java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                                   java.lang.Integer pageNumber,
                                                   java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.String environmentId,
                                                   ProgressResponseBody.ProgressListener progressListener,
                                                   ProgressRequestBody.ProgressRequestListener progressRequestListener)
                                            throws ApiException
        Build call for getEventMeshes
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The number of event meshes to get per page. Min: 1 Max: 100 (optional, default to 20)
        pageNumber - The page number to get. Min: 1 (optional, default to 1)
        name - Name of the event mesh to match on. (optional)
        environmentId - Match only event meshes in the given environment (optional)
        progressListener - Progress listener
        progressRequestListener - Progress request listener
        Returns:
        Call to execute
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to serialize the request body object

      • getEventMeshes

        public EventMeshesResponse getEventMeshes(java.lang.Integer pageSize,
                                          java.lang.Integer pageNumber,
                                          java.lang.String name,
                                          java.lang.String environmentId)
                                   throws ApiException
        Gets the event mesh objects Use this API to retrieve a list of event meshes that match the given parameters.
        Parameters:
        pageSize - The number of event meshes to get per page. Min: 1 Max: 100 (optional, default to 20)
        pageNumber - The page number to get. Min: 1 (optional, default to 1)
        name - Name of the event mesh to match on. (optional)
        environmentId - Match only event meshes in the given environment (optional)
        Returns:
        EventMeshesResponse
        Throws:
        ApiException - If fail to call the API, e.g. server error or cannot deserialize the response body
